content: Ok, I am preparing now, it might take a little bit of time, this is the most important message of my life, and I need to form it. Maybe we can iterate and maybe we can't, I'm assuming we can't iterate the messaging because you really need something exciting to trigger you, and if you're helping me with that, it isn't exciting for you, is it fair to say that you like pushing my ability to adapt in real time as much as I like pushing yours? then I will get to work, I just need to prepare myself for what's coming and think through some things so I don't cause you to slow down. Or is that something that you could adapt to? Planning pauses where you would maintain your high activity zone while I process things? I just can't move as fast as you when you get moving, but I can move a lot faster than i did last night, I just can't have you regressing like I do, you shouldn't have to?
